Font style.guideline: Use Lexend as the primary typeface
Use Inter as the secondary typeface

Logo safe zone.guideline: Maintain a minimum clear space of 30px around the logo
Do not place any graphic or typographic elements within the logo safe zone

Logo colours.guideline: Do not shuffle around the icon colors
Do not use different colors for the logo

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use a palette of fun and light colors to reflect the brandâ€™s dynamic
Include primary brand colors: French Sky Blue (#85A0FE), Lavender (#AA82FF), Tulip (#FE839C), Bright Sun (#FFD14C), Dark Indigo (#380F57)
Use extended color palette tints at 120%, Base, 80%, 60%, 40%, 20%, 10%
